text: The 2019 Torneo di Viareggio is the 71st edition of Torneo di Viareggio, an annual youth football tournament held in Viareggio, Tuscany. == Format == The 40 teams are seeded in 10 groups, 5 groups in pool A and 5 groups in pool B. Each team from a group meets the others in a single tie. The winning club from each group and six best runners-up progress to the knockout stage. All matches in the final rounds are single tie. During the round of 16 no extra time will be played in case of a draw, with the match proceeding immediately to penalty kicks. From the quarterfinals on, matches include 30 minutes extra time and penalties to be played if the draw between teams still holds. ==Participating teams== 40 teams participate in the tournament. The list of the teams are below. ;Italian teams * Ascoli * Benevento * Bologna * Cagliari * Carrarese * Empoli * Fiorentina * Genoa * Inter Milan * Livorno * Milan * Parma * Perugia * Pontedera * Rieti * Salernitana * Sassuolo * Serie D Representatives * SPAL * Spezia * Ternana * Torino * Venezia * Viareggio ;European teams * Club Brugge * Dukla Prague * Nordsjælland * Norchi Dinamo * FK RFS * Braga * Krasnodar ;American teams * Athletico Paranaense * Atlántida Juniors * LIAC New York * UYSS New York * Westchester United ;African teams * Berekum Chelsea * Nania ;Asian/Oceanian teams * APIA
